archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0055
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an agent or chatbot, I want to be able to see and track a customer's order, so that I can assist them if they contact us I can help them

properties.value: What kind of chatbot is mentioned here? We don't see this on the integration list. Answer: yes, this will be an external chatbot. To be confirmed which one (probably Amazon Connect). To be discussed what details are needed to be passed to this system and in which places of the system should be connected.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
